name: After the Fall (itch)
description:
After the Fall throws you right into a post apocalyptic world inspired by Mad Max and Fallout. You slip into the role of a Sleeper ( a person that was in cryo stasis). In the harsh environment of the post apocalyptic wasteland you have to struggle to get along with new odds.

This game is highly minimalized to provide several outcomes and make every decision  you matter. You can kill almost everyone, but be warned, that there are consequences for each of your actions.

In this early prototype you can test following core mechanics: dialogue, dehydration, exploration and combat

This is the German version with an English coming when it's done.
